product_description: Medium Dark Blue slide sandals with size 7, waterproof slippers made of high quality rubber.

copy_data.primary_copy: Step into pure comfort with waterproof rubber slides that keep you stylish & supported. Perfect for beach, pool & beyond!
copy_data.headline: Cloud-Like Comfort Meets Modern Style
copy_data.description: Premium rubber sandals designed for all-day wear. Waterproof protection with a sleek medium dark blue finish that elevates any casual look.

claude_optimized_prompt: Photorealistic medium dark blue rubber slide sandals on weathered wooden deck beside tranquil infinity pool, soft sunset lighting, ocean horizon view, water droplets on sandals for fresh feel, lifestyle composition with negative space in top right, shallow depth of field, high-end commercial photography style

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A photorealistic depiction of medium dark blue rubber slide sandals placed on a weathered wooden deck beside a tranquil infinity pool, set in soft sunset lighting. The scene overlooks an ocean horizon, capturing the serene beauty of the moment. The sandals feature visible water droplets for a fresh feel, creating a relaxing and refreshing vibe. The composition emphasizes high-end commercial photography style, with negative space in the top right corner for potential text or branding. The image uses a shallow depth of field to focus on the sandals while subtly blurring the background, balancing luxury and lifestyle aesthetics.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: Photorealistic medium dark blue rubber slide sandals on weathered wooden deck beside tranquil infinity pool, soft sunset lighting, ocean horizon view, water droplets on sandals for fresh feel, lifestyle composition with negative space in top right, shallow depth of field, high-end commercial photography style
